summary: Completed testing of company logo functionality in System Admin Settings, RFQ PDF export, and Global Reports Excel export. All backend APIs pass (16/16 tests). Frontend UI verified - company logo displays correctly in settings page, reports dashboard has all 5 tabs working, and Excel export button is functional.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Logo functionality is working correctly. Company logo is stored as base64 in database under 'company_logo_base64' key. Excel export includes logo in first sheet. RFQ PDF export includes logo in header. All 5 tabs in QuantityAlertsReportsManager (نظرة عامة, التنبيهات, المباني, الأوامر, التوريد) are working. Advanced Reports modal has 4 tabs (الملخص التنفيذي, تحليل الاعتمادات, أداء الموردين, اختلاف الأسعار) with Excel and PDF export buttons.

company_logo_in_settings.details: Logo displays correctly in System Admin Settings page as base64 image

rfq_pdf_export_with_logo.details: RFQ PDF export endpoint returns valid PDF file

excel_export_with_logo.details: Excel export endpoint returns valid XLSX file with logo in first sheet

global_reports_dashboard_5_tabs.details: All 5 tabs (نظرة عامة, التنبيهات, المباني, الأوامر, التوريد) are present and clickable

export_to_excel_button.details: تصدير Excel button is present and functional in reports page
